title: Kinkarou
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chinese restaurant near Fukiage station in Chikusa that has a veg menu with gyoza, ramen, chow mein (yakisoba), sweet and sour pork, fried rice. Uses soy meat. Ask for the "saishoku" or "veggie" menu. Note it's necessary to call at least 2 hours in advance, so kitchen could prepare the stock etc for vegetarians.
